title: Fighting Inflation Without Getting Carried Away
sub_head: No single investment strategy is a panacea for inflation. But not every option is a good one.
body:
This year, inflation has become the risk everyone seems to want to be protected from. Itâ€™s always good to have insurance, but insurance can get expensive and slipshod when everybody wants it at once.
As you go about protecting your portfolio from inflation, the most important thing to remember is that no single strategy is a panacea. You will have to fight the risk of a decline in your purchasing power in several ways.
